## WorkspaceNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WorkspaceNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<WorkspaceSvg> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy.md)<!-- -->&lt;[WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(current)](./blockly.workspacenavigationpolicy.getfirstchild.md) |  | Returns the first child of the given workspace. |
|  [getNextSibling(\_current)](./blockly.workspacenavigationpolicy.getnextsibling.md) |  | Returns the next sibling of the given workspace. |
|  [getParent(\_current)](./blockly.workspacenavigationpolicy.getparent.md) |  | Returns the parent of the given workspace. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(\_current)](./blockly.workspacenavigationpolicy.getprevioussibling.md) |  | Returns the previous sibling of the given workspace. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.workspacenavigationpolicy.isapplicable.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.workspacenavigationpolicy.isnavigable.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given workspace can be navigated to. |
